item.title: For Beginners EXCEPTION in SQL
item.description: Imagine youâ€™re playing a game where you need to catch a ball. Sometimes, you might not catch the ball perfectly, and it might fall to the ground. But instead of giving up, you learn from your mistake and try again. In SQL, exceptions are like errors that occur during a task, but instead of crashing the program, they give you a chance to handle the error and continue with your task.
